website_summaries.verdict: Easily the best table on our shortlist. Top-notch quality and amazing extra features.
pros: Built-in heating system and comfortable memory foam pad
cons: Heating pad takes a little while to warm the bed

customer_reviews.title: I love the conform of the table as well as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the Master massage table the first of November.. I love the conform of the table as well as the heating element. But just at 6 weeks of using the table, the headrest stopped locking, during a session where a client asked for the headrest to be adjusted. At which time when my client put their head down the headrest dropped giving quite a shock to both me and the client on the table
customer_reviews.author: Angela Moore

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Just unboxed this and the corner seam is already popped. I don't want to go through the hassle of sending this back , but would appreciate some sort of compensation for this. I'm going to have to have my brand new table repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description
customer_reviews.text: The box and the description says that it's a 31" bed, however, when taken out and measured it was only a 28 1/2 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i thought the quality for this table is bad while it looked better
customer_reviews.text: i was so excited when we got this table, we use it to do the at home service for the chlients, it's wide and soft enough. But now, just used it for almost half month, the head of the table become not so stable, and also the outer bag was also broken, i thought the quality for this table is bad while it looked better. and how can i contact the customer service?
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! Very comfortable, the heat works beautifully. Only problem is the head piece has plastic support bars. They WILL break if applying deep pressure while client is face down (and using arm support). So be careful while working on neck
customer_reviews.author: Megan Brienen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful massage table!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Good quality. Easy to assemble. Height easily adjustable. Love the thickness of the cushion. Great head support and tray below to rest your arms in makes it very comfortable. Researched tables carefully before I bought this one. I'm very pleased with this choice. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Tetrick

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: It was expensive. It came late. It came with mold. The box had two gashes. One on each side. There is no protection from this on the inside of box. We lucked out. No damage to table. The heat is ok. Not gonna burn you nor will it keep you warm for long. It is heavy. If shorter than 5' 3", I would not recommend lugging around unless you have a cart. The table itself is as expected. Very sturdy and super comfortable. After sanitization, by my germaphobic self, my husband enjoyed his birthday gift. If you buy, be prepared for anything.
customer_reviews.author: allfaith

customer_reviews.title: The table is wider and comfortable. The heater works very well
customer_reviews.text: The table is wider and comfortable. The heater works very well. But the headrest is a problem. It dropped down while my client was on the table. I see there are other reviews about this. What is being done to resolve this issue? I need a replacement A.S.A.P since I paid for the table and it's accessories. I am not happy about that! So, there really isn't any need for the arm rest if using it increases the chances of there being an issue with the headrest.
customer_reviews.author: T. Friar

customer_reviews.title: AAA+++ Great Table. Heavy though if you are weak.
customer_reviews.text: I love the bed. The adjustableness of it is wonderful. It's sturdy enough but really heavy and awkward to carry, though most tables are. The pillow included is a nice add and was well used during my travels this fall. I especially liked how easy the arm board was to use, though the velcro only goes so short without becoming a problem for the client. The adjustable head tilt face rest worked excellently without the usual problems getting it to stay in place. The case fits snuggly, and once you figure out the toting procedures for it, its nice. The padding was comfortable to all my clients and all my flannel sheets fit it well. Excellent table!
customer_reviews.author: Firethorn

customer_reviews.title: Please fix it!
customer_reviews.text: The table it self is very nice and comfortable but the headboard is broken. The lock keep swinging and every time you put your head in it. It keeps coming down. Just disappointed! Plus the hand handle is broken. I tried to do a refund or replace it , but it says I have to send by it self or if not I get charge. Firsttime I have problems with orders. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Cressan Jade

customer_reviews.title: Arrives Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and sturdy. Arrived damaged. With no padding or reinforcing around the edges - of course it will get ripped. Called amazon and got a great discount!
customer_reviews.author: dubbua

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: This tables proves the point that you get what you pay for! My wife and I have both had a few birthdays, and like many people, have worn out a few body parts. This table folds easily so we don't have to leave it setup. After a long day, the gentle warming from the table to go with a relaxing massage melt away the years and the pain! Very well built and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Bob

customer_reviews.title: You don't get everything shown!
customer_reviews.text: There's a picture showing a half circle pillow for under client's legs in the description and for 361 dollars I want everything down!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Krabs

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I got this table very sturdy. Got so many compliments from my clients of how comfortable and wide is. I highly recommend it. Love the headrest as well is very sturdy and comfortable. I highly recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels soft and yet sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I hurt my back and was given stretches to do by my physical therapist. I was unable to get down on the floor to do exercises and the bed was too soft to use so I bought this in order to do physical therapy three to five times a day. It's been a life saver. Although my back has recovered, I still use this daily to do exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy table!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this beautiful table very sturdy so far ,easy to assemble.fits great in the bag ,it is extra wide so is a bit heavy,but choose a rolling bag .I workout and am quite strong .so after reading reviews opted for this table anyway.The amount of weight it holds and its width. I am so Happy I did!
customer_reviews.author: Annette D.

customer_reviews.title: Overall quality is great. If i were to improve anything it would ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality is great. If i were to improve anything it would be the frame materials of the head rest. It is made of plastic. With the occasional gentle use it has held up well. For everyday use I would think it needs to be metal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heating feature not good, would like to resolve that issue
customer_reviews.text: Heating feature not good, would like to resolve that issue, table firm easy to set up fast, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Taylor

customer_reviews.title: If you are worried about table space go with the wider table.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy,comfortable table and the width is good!! Nice quality, wooden legs are very aesthetically pleasing definitely recommend this table. I’m not a professional just bought it for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: I love it and my clients love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this table for a couple of months now. I love it and my clients love it. They fall asleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie McPherson

customer_reviews.title: great massage table
customer_reviews.text: rarely do i give reviews on anything. However, this one was worth rating 5 STARS. It is so comfortable, warm, sturdy and wide enough that you don't feel like you are going to fall off of it. awesome!
customer_reviews.author: J Kurt Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Its awesome. Comfortable. Face rest is great. Case that came with it fits perfect. Just know it's heavy, so don't think you're gonna be transporting it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Manateeofwar

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy, but I'm not trucking around town with it
customer_reviews.text: I keep this setup in my Reiki Room. Its a very nice table and its comfortable. I did add an authentic wool topper for it and its a perfect match. Made it even softer. Well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: S. Abney

customer_reviews.title: My clients and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with this table. It is the second table I own for my massage practice and definitely the better of the two. My clients say that the square face rest is superior to the horseshoe shaped rest. I greatly appreciate the wider table for all body types. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: jandreas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Table
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use at home and were so impressed with the quality. It's super sturdy, very comfortable and easy to put up and take down. Stores well in our closet.
customer_reviews.author: Lee M Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: It is easy set up and break down
customer_reviews.text: This table's leather is very supple. It is easy set up and break down. It is bulky when broken down but we have an extra room for storage. My wife really enjoys getting massages now and it is so much easier than trying to a massage on the floor or bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Heater is fantastic, feels sturdy, headrest is comfy. Pretty heavy but could be moved if you need.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: All Around Excellent Table
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS TABLE! It takes me forever to choose a massage table. I want a good quality, sturdy table that can handle the different body styles that come through my clinic. I like being able to adjust the height depending on the size of my client. The headrest moves easily and at increments that are helpful for all clients. The arm rest under the headrest makes for a comfortable option. The bag is excellent quality and big enough to hold all the sheets and bolster. The table came with a bolster pillow that helps relieve low back pain while on the table. All around excellent table. I don't anticipate needing a new one for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic, sturdy and comfortable massage table. Easy to assemble and pack back up. My clients are super comfortable on it and the best feature for me is that it holds something like 1600 lbs so I never have to have that awkward conversation about max weight limit and can work on anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Harti

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Worth It!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a wonderful table. I have owned it for about 6 months. People love the heated table aspect! My only feedback is that on one side there are little buttons for when it is closed and on the floor. This sometimes gets in the way of larger customers arms. The face cradle bar also sometimes causes discomfort for some clients.
customer_reviews.author: chemical frequencies

customer_reviews.title: Now I just need to make time for the massages ...
customer_reviews.text: Now I just need to make time for the massages. I am over 300 lbs and it holds my weight without any problem. It is large and storage is an issue, but this is a substantial table.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Mansker

customer_reviews.title: This has been the most comfortable massage table I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This has been the most comfortable massage table I have ever used. Great face rest. I bought this for home use, so I didn't really need to cart it around, but I'm glad it can be easily put away.
customer_reviews.author: MiddleMe

customer_reviews.title: Very  comfortable easy to set up high quality
customer_reviews.text: I like every thing about this table very easy to use high quality.
customer_reviews.author: robert lewis jones

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, fair price
customer_reviews.text: Top quality product. Strong and well made. Pleasantly soft and firm table top padding. Soft and comfortable face cradle. Easy to adjust with rubber backed knobs to help them not come loose. Slightly nicer looking than the pics. We leave the table setup and use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffre

customer_reviews.title: What is that odor?
customer_reviews.text: Just received and remove from box. There is a VERY strong chemical odor! What is it? It is very irritating to my sinuses! Help!
customer_reviews.author: Abuelita

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected, which is, awesome! It didn't come with a bolster but it came with a carrying case, arm rest, face cradle cushion and adjustable face cradle. Memory foam, wide table, sturdy frame and easy set up. I absolutely love it for my first table!
customer_reviews.author: Barbra Neis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This table is worth every dollar, I got exactly what I wanted. It is very comfortable and sturdy. It is very quick to setup. Thank you for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do lashes and I've had a couple of my girls lay on it since I've bought it for a couple of hrs and all of them said it was ext
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed off of the reviews I read and I must say that I agree. I do lashes and I've had a couple of my girls lay on it since I've bought it for a couple of hrs and all of them said it was extremely comfortable! It is also an overall beautiful color and goes great with my black and red theme.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table & Comfy/ Light to carry.
customer_reviews.text: Clients love this table and the face cradle and arm shelf
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Does well as far as comfort & sustains wt of ...
customer_reviews.text: Does well as far as comfort & sustains wt of myself & therapist during manual traction, mobilization/stretching of joints, tendons & muscles
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Grant

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Sets up very easy. The heater works great my wife loves it. Yes, I bought this for home use. Getting to old to bend over the bed, hard on the back. The arm rest cold be better. The Velcro straps to hold it on the head rest is not very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L.

customer_reviews.title: Sponsor me master Massage
customer_reviews.text: I just started my massage therapy journey. I am only using massage massage products for the rest of my massage therapy life. I love their products so much. The memory foam mattress and material are wonderful. Everything comes as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.  Priced a Bit High.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made massage bed. Very comfortable face cradle. Only reason I took away the fifth star is for the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.text: Cushy snazzy table! Old Copper penny color looks great with our Navaho themed therapy room. Big SQUARE headrest is cushy, too angular and puffy for crescent shaped covers but disposables work well. Does not come with bolster, has arm rest but I'm clueless on figuring out how to attach it.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: This massage table is very sturdy. The heating component to this table does work properly but it does take 30 mins to heat up. I am glad we purchased this table. Very comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Solrita

customer_reviews.title: Better For A Stationary Table than Portable
customer_reviews.text: I am a Massage a therapist that has house calls very frequently and I needed a new table so I got this one..I've had the table for a month now .. my clients love it, headrest is super comfortable(most comfortable i ever felt) and the table is top notch, one of my clients called it the "cadillac" of massage tables lol I would rate it 5 of 5 but it has a few things that make me struggle going upstairs to a clients place. Only 2 negative comments- 1.Table is too heavy 2. It came with a carrying case (useless) it's uncomfortable, awkward and made a bruise on my shoulder, your better off throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaldo S.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Best money I every spent .quality of the product was above my exspectations. It’s easy to use and store off to the side.its very sturdy and pops right open .
customer_reviews.author: Gordon harden

customer_reviews.title: super comfy
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up and fold back. makes you not want to leave it due to the comfiness
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My table just arrived and I couldn't be more pleased. It is gorgeous, sturdy, wide and extremely transportable. Can't wait to start using it on Monday. My clients will be thrilled with the upgrade!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the extra price
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed, nice features plus it will build up your arms carrying it around
customer_reviews.author: Pete R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent look and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Beyond what I expected. Excellent look and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend 👍
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the investment to purchase a high quality product! Highly recommend 👍
customer_reviews.author: Tom Drogalis

customer_reviews.title: Very NICE table!  Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy! Very plush/soft. 31inches is nice width (feel like you won't fall off table and yet your massage technician easily can get to you). Head and arm rest is great (very comfortable). Foot pillow is fine. Color: Not necessarily my cup of tea (it looks exactly like pictured) but figured that really did not matter, since it covered by sheet and blanket. Weight: We don't mind it because ours is staged in basement (never moves from room/location). Unexpected includes in pkg which were nice: Relaxing CD and about 50 extra head rest sanitize covers (just lay over head rest). Sheets: We purchased FORPRO Premium Flannel Sheet 3-piece set from Amazon, which fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: YorkieATLMom

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: great comfortable table, I have had mine for 4 years and clients love it. The extra width allows comfort for larger clients. Well constructed, Love this table
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This table is awesome! Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome! Very sturdy, high quality and given the size it is surprisingly light-weight! My wife is super excited for her first massage on this table tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Well built and sturdy. It is a bit on the heavy side but its manageable and worth the sturdiness trade off.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Feedback

customer_reviews.title: I love this massage/healing touch table
customer_reviews.text: I love this massage/healing touch table!! Perfect condition, arrived on time, adjustable table height & head donut tilt, soft leather type material, memory foam, light enough to carry, great zippered case for carrying/storing and sturdy enough for my 6'6" husband!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. RN

customer_reviews.title: 30 inch table with an awesome headrest
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a 31inch table not a 30 inch table with one inch bumpers on the side. The face cradle is awesome however and suture friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The table is good, seems sturdy and will serve its purpose
customer_reviews.text: The table is good, seems sturdy and will serve its purpose. It seems heavier than it is but probably because of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: Great massage table
customer_reviews.text: this was an excellent table. Had to return due to fact. Height measurements were incorrect. Stated table would go to 34". very incorrect !!!!! Only 32". Amazon was not in the least helpful. It became my problem even though they were wrong, a lot of were sorry with a lack of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: shelley baker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not quite happy with the thickness of the table
customer_reviews.author: Venie Gray

customer_reviews.title: A REal Comfort to Have
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I got it for our personal use. We were paying to get massages each month, so we learned the technique from our massage therapist, so we decided to do it ourselves at home!!! The only draw back was it had a tear on the side of the table. but it is covered with the sheets we purchased. Hopefully the tear doesn't get bigger, but other than that great product!!! Just to revise my review, I was sent another table within a weeks time. No Hassle at all. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: WALTER C.

customer_reviews.title: High quality & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a salon suite doing eyelash extensions; this massage table has been wonderful for my clients to have a comfortable place to lay down and relax while getting their lashes done. I love that it has the ability to heat up as well, and I can control the heat settings for each client's preference. The item was as described and delivered quickly! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: You will be hard pressed to find a product this good for the price. gorgeous color sturdy build, unique headrest. I live in Hawaii and am a bit worried about the foam underneath being susceptible to mold, but that is aa risk I take anyways. The material feels a little squishy but it stops short of being mushy and is also surprisingly firm. I love what they have done with the headrest, way more comfortable than a usual circle design. Keep up the good work Master Massage!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Catlin

customer_reviews.title: Best "bed" I've ever slept on! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to sleep on because I need as firm a mattress as possible for my royally screwed up spine. It's extremely sturdy (doesn't budge an inch - I'm 140lbs). It's the must comfortable "bed" I've ever slept on. And when it's chilly, I "preheat" it about an hour before bedtime & set the timer for two hours. Toasty to fall asleep, find off soon enough to not wake up sweaty during the night. (FYI, I use the lowest heat - this thing can get HOT! It's amazing!)
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but should be if you want heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday and there was no assembly required. Just unfold the table and snap in the head/arm rests. Very nice portable table. As others have said, it's every bit of the 47 pounds. I haven't used the bag, but it's almost impossible to carry by the handles that are attached to the table because of how large it is when it's folded. The girl holding the table in the carrying bag in the picture is NOT holding this table ;)
customer_reviews.author: John Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great massage table. Very sturdy and love the heat availability. Have had many individuals tell me the heat is wonderful without getting too hot. Makes them feel very relaxed. The table is also nicely sized and fits many individuals that are not "small". Great features make this table the one to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jawill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my wife and she loves it (Both the table and the increased frequency she is getting massages :). The arm rest was a little different but she seems to like it--assembling it is a bit odd though and takes a little getting used to. You won't find a better deal (I did a lot of research) and if you're looking for a home massage table, you won't be disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: McClory Family

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but lacks a color-matched bolster
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Great case. Great heaters. Should come with a wheeled case. Should come with a color-matched bolster.
customer_reviews.author: I.B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fits her clients much more comfortably. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister's office practice. She loves it, especially the memory foam and extra wide platform. Fits her clients much more comfortably. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Would do it again in a second
customer_reviews.text: Love the heater and very sturdy. The width makes it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DiverDown

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Master Tables are known to be stiffer ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Master Tables are known to be stiffer even with extra cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Labno, PT, DPT

customer_reviews.title: Not quite working
customer_reviews.text: Love it and comphy , but the head peice is not working. It wont stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Good solid table
customer_reviews.text: Good solid table, I haven't used it much yet. It is comfortable. There needs to be tougher packing materials because mine arrived with permanent marks on the bed. Indents from being poked etc.
customer_reviews.author: Marie R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table but it is heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table. Only downside is that it is really heavy. So not really portable for too far. I like that it is so strong and has a tremendous weight maximum.
customer_reviews.author: hvrietsc

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. Very sturdy. Packaged very nice. Arrived on time. Oh and the face cradle is the absolute best.
customer_reviews.author: SimpliSuni1

customer_reviews.title: Best table around  Amazon has the best price !!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and at the very best price Amazon delivers again!!! super quick service! Very satisfied! Amazon ROCKS!!! David Simoniello
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a beautiful table. I especially appreciate the headrest as most ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a beautiful table. I especially appreciate the headrest as most people complain about sinus pressure being put on face by other less desirable face rests. The bag has pockets which are useful but I have not had a chance to use yet since I'm using this primarily for stationary work. The only complaint I have of this table is the cushion/padding of the table is firmer much more than my oak works table. I even placed my plush heating pad on top and it didn't help much. I hope it will break down a bit and that this is temporary.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: We love body work
customer_reviews.text: We love body work! Wood is a little creeky. Still in one piece tho! Better than trying to work on the floor:)
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this table and am so happy we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love .... It's very comfortable , the fit its ideal and is beauty too. I recommend ....
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: this is such a great table and a great deal
customer_reviews.text: this is such a great table and a great deal. Use it in my massage practice. Clients say it is comfortable. I also really love the shape and feel of the headrest.
customer_reviews.author: Johnna Langlo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very well made and very comfortable, I would definitely buy another one from this company.
customer_reviews.author: D1&K2

customer_reviews.title: Solidly Built
customer_reviews.text: This was the hit of our Summer Party. Sturdy. Solid. Best part was that even our over-sized guests were able to enjoy a massage without being fearful of relaxing on an unsteady surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & design
customer_reviews.text: Light enough to be portable but supports heavy loads. Using it for Reiki. Lots of height adjustment choices.
customer_reviews.author: merman

customer_reviews.title: Well built. Exactly as described. It works splendidly ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Exactly as described. It works splendidly for me so far. Carrying is a little cumbersome, but being only 5'2" I don't get it more than 6 inches off the ground. :)
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Got it to massage my husband
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size . Got it to massage my husband .
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Helps my wife's back pain
customer_reviews.text: My wife has developed a back problem. One that she can relieve temporarily if she lays on her stomach for a while. A bed and pillow works OK except for that nagging problem of needing air in her lungs. This table is her ticket to relief for her back pain and you know, it's great for MASSAGES too.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford E. Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Some of the Best Money that I've ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas Gift, "for the House"! Some of the Best Money that I've ever spent. A Table with a heating element, as this one, is FANTASTIC!!! The Cover is quite durable! The Padding is Excellent !! The Legs are Easily & Quickly & Expansively Adjustable!!! The Whole Table Folds up Easily & Rapidly and Stores quite Comfortably, although we have left it up, in front of the fireplace, most of the Time...Yup, we leave the Lava Lamp plugged in All the Time, Too !!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Sanders

product_meta.title: Master Massage Santana Therma Top Memory Foam Portable Massage Table Package, Mountain Red, 31 Inch
product_meta.description: Size:Therma TopEndless features of the 31" Santana ThermaTop Pro mean more bang for the buck for professionals looking to provide a range of services and bodywork, from traditional massage to intense physical therapy. It's fully loaded with Built-in ThermaTop, Therma- Top ETL/CETL-Certified for strict North American Safety Standards. Reiki end panels, memory foam, shiatsu cable release and 5 year guarantee PU upholstery. The Master Massage’s patented built-in ThermaTop adjustable heat bed soothes muscles, improves circulation and increases vitality. The wide shouldered Big Top bed provides 26% more cushioned space within the same size footprint as standard tables, and that cushioning consists of 3" thick Multi-Layer Small Cell foam which a layer of memory foam is included. The cushioning is protected by beautiful Mountain Red PU upholstery that is oil- and water-resistant, CFC-free, and features a denim-like backing to reinforce the upholstery durability which is backed by a 5 year guarantee. A strong table protected by double-strength Reiki leg panels, Duo-Plane hinges at the center of the table and a stabilizer bar means that with proper care, this table could last for years and years. This professional package includes a six-way adjustable ErgonomicDream face cradle, memory foam ErgonomicDream face pillow to relieve pressure points, contoured armrest shelf and two-pocket carrying case.
feature_bullets: 31" width x 84" length x 24" to 34" adjustable height, the table itself only weighs 37lbs

3” Thick Cushion of Multi-Layer Small Cell Foam – includes a layer of MEMORY FOAM! Oil & Waterproof, CFC-free, PU Upholstery in Mountain Red Color. Therma- Top ETL/CETL-Certified for strict North American Safety Standards.
Managed Forest Hard European Beech Wood with Hi-gloss Elm Colored Dura-Seal Protected Finish, Patented Built-In Therma-Top HEATED BED.
Elm color stained European imported Beech wood legs; 1, 500lbs. Aircraft-grade steel support cables gives the table a working capacity of 750lbs.
Accessories includes: Innovated Ergonomic Dream Adjustable Face Cradle, Memory Foam Face Cushion, Fully Padded Armrest Shelf and a 2 Pockets Carrying Case!; Double luggage-style table closure clasps.
